task.name: h_save
task.shortdescription: Save the pipeline state to disk
task.description: h_save saves the current pipeline state to disk under a unique name.
task.example:
h_save saves the current pipeline state to disk under a unique name.
Keyword arguments:
filename -- Name of the saved pipeline state. If filename is '' then a unique name will be generated computed from the root, 'context', the current stage number, and the time stamp. default: ''
Description
h_save saves the current pipeline state to disk under a unique name. If no name is supplied one is generated automatically from a combination of the root name, 'context', the current stage number, and a time stamp.
Issues
Example
1. Save the current state in the default file
h_save()
2. Save the current state to a user named file
h_save(filename='savestate_1')
